episodes.title: Race Across The Urban Landscape Of St Petersburg
episodes.plot: Jeremy drives a hover van, James a car, Richard goes by bike and The Stig uses public transport in a race through St Petersburg. Ed Sheeran is the guest and Richard tests the new Lamborghini Huracan.

episodes.title: Australian Northern Territory Road Trip In GT Cars
episodes.plot: The boys embark on a trip across Australia's Northern Territory in a BMW M6 Gran Coupe, a Bentley Continental GT v8 and a Nissan GT-R. Kiefer Sutherland is the star in the Reasonably Priced Car.

episodes.title: Homemade Ambulance Challenge
episodes.plot: The boys attempt to improve emergency response times by creating their own ambulances. Daniel Ricciardo is a star in a reasonably priced car.

episodes.title: Tribute To The Land Rover Defender
episodes.plot: Jeremy drives the BMW I8, the Rural Simpleton is in a land-rover tribute and May is, well, just May.

episodes.title: May And Clarkson Look At The Weird And Wonderful History Of Peugeot
episodes.plot: James and Jeremy dive in the history of Peugeot, Richard compares the new Porsche cayman GTS vs new Corvette. And the new 950-horsepower LaFerrari hyper-car hybrid, Singer Olly Murs is the star in the reasonably priced car.

episodes.title: Hammond Is Dropped Into British Columbia, Canada To Test A Watch With A Built-In Emergency Beacon
episodes.plot: Richard Hammond goes to a mountain in Canada to test a watch. Jeremy Clarkson and James May will try to save him in two American cars. Jeremy Clarkson tests the new car from Lexus.

episodes.title: May Competes In A World Rallycross Race Alongside Tanner Foust
episodes.plot: Clarkson compares the Jaguar F-Type to a remastered version of the legendary E-Type, Hammond tests an all new Mazda MX-5, May drives a rallye car against Top Gear US presenter Tanner Foust and Nicolas Hoult is the star in the reasonably priced car.

episodes.title: Episode #22.8
episodes.plot: The boys acquire traditional classic convertibles before setting off an adventure. The trio are also challenged to each buy a high-mileage and low-quality SUV before undergoing a series of challenges.
